awd_titl_txt: A National Computer Conferencing Network for Science and    Math Education:  PSInet
awd_abstract_narration: People Sharing Information Network, PSInet, is a National                       Computer Conferencing Network for Science and Mathematics                       Education which currently links all State Science                               Supervisors, a number of science education agencies, and                        which has intra-state networks in place in six states.  This                    project will extend PSInet capabilities to the State                            Mathematics Supervisors and to the Presidential Award Winners                   for Excellence in Science and Mathematics Teaching.  In                         addition, intra-state networks will be established in the 44                    states which are currently not "on-line".  Cost Sharing in                      the amount of $650,000 is 97% of the NSF contribution.
org_div_long_name: Division of Research on Learning in Formal and Informal Settings (DRL)
